name: Sinister Serpent
desc: During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard: You can add it to your hand, also banish 1 "Sinister Serpent" from your Graveyard during your opponent's next End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Sinister Serpent" once per turn.

ocg.pack: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters III: Tri-Holy God Advent promotional cards

tcg.pack: Yu-Gi-Oh! Worldwide Edition - Stairway to the Destined Duel - Bundles
